long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Tired of struggling with endless threads on X (formerly Twitter)? Tweet Thread Splitter is here to simplify your life! ğŸ§µâœ¨ Transform your longer thoughts into engaging threads with just one click.

Write your message, click "Split into Thread," and the extension will automatically divide your text into perfectly-sized tweets, ready to be posted.

No more stress over character limits!

Forget the days of manually cutting, pasting, and counting characters. Tweet Thread Splitter handles everything for you, so you can focus on what really matters: sharing your ideas with the world.

Hereâ€™s why Tweet Thread Splitter is the perfect choice for your threads on X:

- Completely Free: No hidden fees or subscriptions required; use it as much as you like without spending a penny.
- Privacy Focused: We donâ€™t store your text. Your content remains yours alone, ensuring full privacy and control.
- Ease of Use: The intuitive interface makes thread splitting a breeze. Paste your text, click, and post!
- Smart Splitting: Our sophisticated algorithm ensures natural breaks in sentences, maintaining the integrity and flow of your thoughts.
- Customizable Breaks: Insert â€œ[â€¦]â€ to manually dictate the start of a new tweet.
- Automatic Numbering: Choose from various numbering styles for your tweets, or disable it entirely.
- Easy Copy and Paste: Copy individual tweets or the entire thread with one click and paste them on X in seconds.
- Save Time and Energy: Focus on creating quality content without worrying about character limits.
- Enhance Engagement: Well-structured threads are easier to read and generate more interactions.

Tweet Thread Splitter is perfect for:

- Writers
- Bloggers
- Marketers
- Journalists
- Content Creators
- Anyone who loves sharing their ideas on X
